entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: The Imperial reconnaissance droid led to the discovery of an assassination plot that was foiled when you eliminated the Imperial generals behind the plot and the assassin who was to carry it out.
entries.journal_entry_description: Your assignment from Mon Mothma is to investigate a damaged Imperial Reconnaissance droid that was detected in the area.
entries.task00_item_name: You have downloaded all of the data held by the droid
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: A damaged Imperial Reconnaissance droid has been detected thanks to its distress beacon. Find the droid and recover any information it may hold. It appears to be somewhere to the northeast of the old Jedi temple.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: According to information gleaned from the reconnaissance droid you recovered, two ruthless Imperial generals are present at the Dantooine Imperial base as is an assassin who has been hired to take out General Dodonna and Admiral Ackbar. Your mission is to eliminate those threats. Thanks to the droid, we have the exact location of their base.
entries.task01_task_display_string_3: Find and Destroy the Imperial Assassin
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: An Imperial assassin has been hired to go after General Dodonna and Admiral Ackbar. Find the assassin and destroy him.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Find and Destroy the Imperial Assassin
